name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (Vexagon)
description:
Project is in beta, This current project wont update! To get the autoupdater check this section regulary

This is a really fun, top down Zombie Shoother game. It displays your score each time you kill a zombie. 

To do?

  • Add high score
  • A menu gui for changing caracters
  • Able to change guntypes
  • Add gun sounds

How to install?

  1. Download the installer
  2. Launch the Installer
  3. Agree to the EULA
  4. Launch the Game

Bugs & errors

Please comment any bugs & errors so i can fix them
